body_html:
Closing as this seems to be a duplicate of #8396.

Regarding the model performance: this is expected because the SoftMax layer at the top of Inception will always output values summing to 1.0. To work around this you would need to use a different type of layer for classification or add a default class to your training data (training with a variety of random images may work, but that's a discussion for elsewhere).

body:
Closing as this seems to be a duplicate of #8396.

Regarding the model performance: this is expected because the SoftMax layer at the top of Inception will always output values summing to 1.0. To work around this you would need to use a different type of layer for classification or add a default class to your training data (training with a variety of random images may work, but that's a discussion for elsewhere).
